title: Jinx my love <3
body: I am in **desperate** need for a new Jinx skin :){{champion:222}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:222}}

replies.body:
We thought she needed a new skin, too! 

Firecracker Jinx just hit the PBE! :D
Will this skin be legacy? I really, really need to save my RP for rune pages but dang that skin is tempting.... rito y u do dis :P

> [{quoted}](name=MrBuffington,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hnH39nXN,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-01-13T21:08:18.381+0000)
>
> Will this skin be legacy? I really, really need to save my RP for rune pages but dang that skin is tempting.... rito y u do dis :P

Firecracker Jinx is **not** Legacy! :D

when I saw the name "fire cracker" I thought "finally! a 4th of July skin! at long last!"

but no such joy and jubilation to be found on RoG. oh well, it's still a nice skin. :(

> [{quoted}](name=Thryale,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hnH39nXN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-13T20:41:02.099+0000)
>
> when I saw the name "fire cracker" I thought "finally! a 4th of July skin! at long last!"
> 
> but no such joy and jubilation to be found on RoG. oh well, it's still a nice skin. :(

There's totally fireworks!

Fire works.

...I'll show myself out. XD

But hats off to Riot!!!

For bringing up a nice skin for Jinx, with all the texture updates for the new skin, new animations it looks pretty cool. Should have updated the ability icons too.. :D

To be fair there are champions that need one before her. 

But realistically. There's no way they're having trouble coming up with a skin idea. There's so many out there. There's so much you can do with her. 

I understand there is a lot to work on with multiple guns and such. But I really doubt they would remake another champion a problem like Rumble's skin options are. I'm sure they learned their lesson. 
Probably
